pageContext.claim: “At least 7 dead and 48 wounded in terror attack and Mayor of London says there is 'no reason to be alarmed!'”
pageContext.analysis: Trump takes London Mayor Sadiq Khan's comments totally out of context, making it seem as though Khan was playing down the deadly attacks on June 3 on the London Bridge and Borough Market. Khan said there is "no reason to be alarmed" about the increased police presence following the attacks. Khan condemned the attacks: "I am appalled and furious that these cowardly terrorists would deliberately target innocent Londoners and bystanders enjoying their Saturday night."
